scripts.dev: rm -rf dist/* && cp -r ./data dist/ && parcel src/index.html
scripts.dev-win: n-clean dist && n-copy --source data --destination dist/data "**" && parcel src/index.html
scripts.prod: rm -rf docs/stage2secret && sass src/lovely-chart/styles/index.scss src/lovely-chart/styles/lovely-chart.css --no-source-map && gulp prod
